snippet.title: Vavio Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Play for free on Windows, OSX, and Linux here: https://peculiarcarrot.itch.io/vavio

Vavio is a bullet hell where the enemies are synced to the music! There are 12 different stages, and while it starts out slow, it quickly gets pretty difficult! Like... really hard. It's a bullet hell.

If you enjoy music, this game might make you enjoy it a little bit less!
